name: The Old Reader (theoldreader.com)(Dark and Orange)
description:
This is a dark theme for The Old Reader (theoldreader.com).
The is no true black or true white, but there is some orange.

It is not perfect; there are some elements that are not handled properly, etc.
additional_info:
V 0.2.1
- posted 2013-06-25
- fixed style so that it only applies to theoldreader.com

V 0.2
- posted 2013-06-25
- made text color consistent
- added handling for more link styles (hopefully all)
- added placeholders for DIY image customization (replace logo, search, and add subscription icons)
- - image replacement placeholders are right at the top of the CSS; edit the CSS to point to your image if desired


V 0.1
- posted 2013-06-20
